0.1.name: wordpress/fotolog-widget
0.1.description: fotolog.com is a site where people upload photos periodically. Recently they added RSS support. The default RSS widget doesn't work right because the server doesn't respond to HTTP 1.0 requests. This widget is specific for the site, so it is easier to set up. This first version shows thumbnails of the last added photos to a fotolog.
